title: Tech, managerial experience not relevant criteria for bidder selection: FinMin on CEL sale - Economic Times
content: Tech, managerial experience not relevant criteria for bidder selection: FinMin on CEL sale  Economic Times
description: In a written reply to the Lok Sabha, Minister of State for Finance Bhagwat Karad said some allegations have been received from a CEL employees' association with regard to the strategic sale. "Pending legal examination of some of these allegations, the IMG has decided to put the Letter of Intent (LOI) on hold. Accordingly, the LOI has not been issued yet," Karad said.
